parameters.name: Category
parameters.description:
The abbreviation of the cloud service name. Valid values of N: 1 to 200.

>  For more information about how to obtain the abbreviation of a cloud service name, see `metricCategory` in the response parameter `Labels` of the [DescribeProjectMeta](~~114916~~) operation.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the application group.

parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can query multiple instances by specifying multiple IDs.

parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword used to search for instances. Fuzzy search based on instance names is supported.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.
